contents.title: Family ranch with various attractions
contents.body: Our facility is ideal for everyone. We have many attractions and tours, with plenty of interaction with animals and qualified instructors. Check out the image gallery of our ranch.

contents.title: Beautiful horse breeds
contents.body: We have a wide variety of purebred horses, award-winning horses. Take a look at some of our animals.

contents.title: Guided tours at affordable prices
contents.body: We offer a wide variety of attractions and a veterinary medical center, hotel, jockey lessons, and much more at affordable prices. See our prices.

contents.title: Specialized veterinary medical center
contents.body: We have one of the best equine veterinary centers in the state, a premium facility with high-quality specialist doctors, guided tours, psychological rehabilitation treatment using horses, horseback riding, racing, and much more. Explore our services.

contents.title: Equine specialized team
contents.body: Our team specializes in horse breeding. We work hard to be a reference in breeding championship-winning breeds. Get to know some of the members of our team.
